item.title: Talks
item.description: Lectures for Great Ideas in Computer Science, Fall 2022 Great Ideas in Computer Science is a course for freshmen at ACM Honor Class, SJTU, where I served as a teaching assistant. Complexity Analysis. Introduce simple lower bound analysis and time space complexity for Turing machine. Proof, Verification and NP-hardness. A brief introduction of NP-hardness and some major topics in complexity theory. Presentations for Theoretical Computer Science, Spring 2021 This is a course project of Theoretical Computer Science, an introductory course for second year undergraduate students at ACM Honor Class, SJTU.
